body.body: Label Location - Bonneville T100, Bonneville T100 Black, Bonneville T120, Bonneville T120 Black, Street Scrambler, Street Cup, Street Twin, Thruxton 1200 and Thruxton 1200 R
Bonneville T100, Bonneville T100 Black, Bonneville T120, Bonneville T120 Black, Street Scrambler, Street Cup, Street Twin, Thruxton 1200 and Thruxton 1200 R

Ensure the correct R41 Data Label is fitted to the motorcycle. Fitting the incorrect label will not have the correct information for the motorcycle which may contravene local or national laws in your market, territory or country.
For Bonneville T100 and Bonneville T100 Black the label T3930513 is to be used.
For Bonneville T120 and Bonneville T120 Black the label T3930511 is to be used.
For Street Scrambler the label T3930503 is to be used.
For Street Cup the label T3930510 is to be used.
For Street Twin the label T3930509 is to be used.
For Thruxton 1200 and Thruxton 1200 R the label T3930512 is to be used.
The R41 Data Label is located on the right hand side of the headstock on the upper tube of frame.
Common text for label location fuel tank Removal SRAN 553
Remove the fuel tank as described in the Service Manual.
The surface to which the label is affixed must be clean and dry to ensure that the adhesive has a sound base to adhere to. Use a cleaning wipe for this purpose.
Using a cleaning wipe, remove any dirt or dust on or around the area of the original R41 Data Label.

body.body: Refer to the Installation of the R41 Data Label in the Safety Recall Action Notice 553 for the installation of the new R41 Data Label.
Refit the fuel tank as described in the Service Manual.

body.body: Label Location _ Speed Triple R and Speed Tiple S
Speed Triple R and Speed Triple S

Ensure the correct R41 Data Label is fitted to the motorcycle. Fitting the incorrect label will not have the correct information for the motorcycle which may contravene local or national laws in your market, territory or country.
For Speed Triple R and Speed Triple S parts kit T3930605 is to be used.
The R41 Data Label is located on the right hand side of the seat under tray, under the seat's front bridge.
Remove the rider's seat as described in the Service Manual.
Remove the rear panels as described in the Service Manual.
Remove and discard the two rear fixings securing the seat bridge to the frame. Keep the washers for installation.
Remove the two front fixings and position the seat bridge to one side. Retain the two front fixings and washers for installation.
The surface to which the label is affixed must be clean and dry to ensure that the adhesive has a sound base to adhere to. Use a cleaning wipe for this purpose.
Using a cleaning wipe, remove any dirt or dust on or around the area of the original R41 Data Label.
Refer to the Installation of the R41 Data Label in Safety Recall Action Notice 553 for the installation of the new R41 Data Label.
Position the seat bridge to the frame and fit the original washers and two new rear fixings to the seat bridge. Do not fully tighten at this stage.
Fit the two original front washers, fixings and tighten to
Tighten the two rear fixings to
Fit the two rear panels as described in the Service Manual.
Fit the rider's seat as described in the Service Manual.
